Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've been having intermittent fevers and painful swelling of my right ankle for the past 10 days.

Just the right ankle is swollen.

No, I don't have a history of autoimmune diseases, but I have sickle cell disease.
Final Diagnosis: Sickle cell crisis with possible localized vaso-occlusive crisis in the right ankle.
